LanguageData.MSEthanol.label: Ethanol (Synthetic)
LanguageData.MSEthanol.description: Ethanol is a volatile, flammable, colorless liquid with a slight characteristic odor. It is a psychoactive substance and is the principal type of alcohol found in alcoholic drinks. Used as a precursor chemical to form other items. Excessive consumption can lead to alcohol blackouts and, over time, addiction. (Made with Chemfuel and Sulphuric Acid).
LanguageData.MSEthanol.tools.0.label: bottle
LanguageData.MSEthanol.tools.1.label: neck
